name: Blind Faith
description:
Your king is dead! Play with goblins and humans, and seek your mindless vengeance. Can blind faith in a cause go too far?

Controls:

Movement: A/D or Left/Right arrow keys

Primary Attack: Z/J

Secondary Attack/Defense: X/K

Exit Game: ESC

Developers:

Eduardo Pinheiro
Ian Costa
Rafael Tomazela
Vitor Casadei

Sound and music design:

Vitor Casadei

Artist:

Gabriel Cebrián

CC0 sounds:

qubodup - https://freesound.org/people/qubodup/sounds/59992/
Qat - https://freesound.org/people/Qat/sounds/107589/

Gameplay:
